overview:
Mark Nadal is a 20 year old entrepreneur living in Southern California that focuses on the philosophy behind technologies. Prior to moving to Los Angeles, he studied computer science and mathematics and worked on a long standing stealth project called Axead. Mark is now the CEO of Accelsor, a realtime web design and content creation suite.

In October of 2010 he discovered and reported a security vulnerability in T-Mobile’s servers and published an article under full disclosure to tmobilehack.com containing instructions on how to exploit T-Mobile’s spam blocker. Currently, T-Mobile has taken no known precautionary action to protect their 34+ million subscribers.

Before graduating highschool, Mark achieved national notoriety for competitive forensics in speech and debate and developed an algorithm for encrypting prime numbers. Aside from his ventures, he dabbles in traditional and digital art, writes, and has traveled to 17 countries.
